gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.index
Class TripleBasedObjectViewSupport

java.lang.Object
  gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.index.TripleBasedObjectViewSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectViewSupport
public class TripleBasedObjectViewSupport
extends Object
implements ObjectViewSupport

An default implementation of ObjectViewSupport. All methods are implemented in terms of triple queries.

Author:
Andreou Dimitris, email: jim.andreou (at) gmail (dot) com

Method Detail

findAncestors

public Iterable<? extends RdfNode> findAncestors(Resource schemaResource,
                                                 Transitively transitively)
Description copied from interface: ObjectViewSupport
Returns the ancestors of a schema resource. A schema resource can be a class, a metaclass, a property or a metaproperty.

Specified by:
findAncestors in interface ObjectViewSupport
Parameters:
schemaResource - the schema resource
transitively - if true, all ancestors recursively must be returned, otherwise just the direct ones
Returns:
the ancestors of a schema resource

isFirstAncestorOfSecond

public boolean isFirstAncestorOfSecond(Resource maybeAncestor,
                                       Resource maybeDescendant)
Description copied from interface: ObjectViewSupport
Returns true if the first resource is an ancestor of the second resource (or if they are the same), false otherwise.

Specified by:
isFirstAncestorOfSecond in interface ObjectViewSupport
Parameters:
maybeAncestor - the first resource, which is tested whether it is an ancestor of the second
maybeDescendant - the second resource, which is tested whether it is a descendant of the first
Returns:
true if the first resource is an ancestor of the second resource, false otherwise

findMembersOfContainer

Description copied from interface: ObjectViewSupport
Returns the members of the specified container.

Specified by:
findMembersOfContainer in interface ObjectViewSupport
Parameters:
container - the container (of type rdf:Bag, rdf:Alt or rdf:Seq) of which to return the members
Returns:
the members of the specified container
